title: 特朗普：Hong Kong markets will go to hell

replies.msg:
https://www.straitstimes.com/asia/east-asia/trump-says-hong-kong-will-go-to-hell-under-china-control


WASHINGTON (AFP) - United States President Donald Trump said on Thursday (Aug 13) that Hong Kong will "go to hell" as a global financial centre under tightened Chinese rule.

"Hong Kong can never succeed having China as opposed to the thousands of geniuses that ran it, having China run it," Mr Trump told Fox Business news. "The Hong Kong markets will go to hell. Nobody's going to do business."
